Articles.Content: ok first off, hello i am new to the forum, so i have a issue with my game, my game has been working just fine for the last 5 days and now ive tried to play several times today and i keep getting a crash error . i have validated the viles through steam several times and all the files are good,but the message i get is... the game crashed. the crash report folder named "2017-01-17_141030"next to the game executable. it would be great if you'd send it to the developer of the game!... anyone have any ideas to fix it

Hi @DesuVindictus, can you provide the crash report folder please, you can put it on dropbox or google drive.

We'll need the files to find out what's going on, see here for more info.

to be honest im not sure how to do it lol, but ill give it a try. i know i can put the files into a folder on google drive , but what do i do after that ? do i just paste a link here ?

Edited January 17, 2017 by DesuVindictus

19 minutes ago, DesuVindictus said:

to be honest im not sure how to do it lol, but ill give it a try. i know i can put the files into a folder on google drive , but what do i do after that ? do i just paste a link here ?

You'd also have to make it public so others can download it, but yes that should work.

2 minutes ago, sal_vager said:

You'd also have to make it public so others can download it, but yes that should work.

ok i think i figured this out lol, here is the link . https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/0B75GW8YpNS-oLXNTSFRaZG9kV0k?usp=sharing.. i have it named KSP crash report 

 

Edited January 17, 2017 by DesuVindictus

Well it's a heavily modded install @DesuVindictus, modded support is the other subforum

The crash report says you're running the 32bit version and you are running out of memory, 32bit applications can't use more than about 3.5gigs on most versions of Windows.

You'll have to try fewer mods or right click KSP in Steam and run the 64bit version, that's if you are using a 64bit operating system on a 64bit cpu, and it looks like you are as I see an AMD64 driver for your graphics card.

Running KSP 64bit will allow KSP to use more of your RAM.

Hope this helps, and I'll pop this over to modded support.

Just now, sal_vager said:

Well it's a heavily modded install @DesuVindictus, modded support is the other subforum

The crash report says you're running the 32bit version and you are running out of memory, 32bit applications can't use more than about 3.5gigs on most versions of Windows.

You'll have to try fewer mods or right click KSP in Steam and run the 64bit version, that's if you are using a 64bit operating system on a 64bit cpu, and it looks like you are as I see an AMD64 driver for your graphics card.

Running KSP 64bit will allow KSP to use more of your RAM.

Hope this helps, and I'll pop this over to modded support.

that must be the issue , because i know i have plenty of ram, i have just over 12GB . ill try to run in 64bit and see how it goes . ty for the help

If you get further problems you might want to consider disabling RivaTuner, especially if your issue began after installing it or after it updated, as programs like RivaTuner will mess about with your computers memory while KSP is running, and can cause KSP to crash.

ok that was indeed the issue. i went into the setting in the launcher and set it to run in 64bit and the game actually loaded faster then it normally does. once again i thank you very much . i was starting to go crazy because i love this game some much. i have 140+ games on steal alone and i play KSP 9/10 times
This happens to me as well
